1537570.name: My First Convention Is A Trap
1537570.description:
Celebrate cosplay and geek culture together with Annie Tangerine!

Crash Huskey Con, roundhouse kick cosplayers, and save your friends from becoming mindless nerds in this fast-paced action platformer with beat'em-up elements!

You're Annie Tangerine - definitely NOT a gamer - and you've just stumbled into the world's most anticipated convention. Some of the cosplayers are acting weird, and there's a guy with a TV for a head running the show. Time to solve this the only way you know how: with your fists and your kicks (Yea, your passion is Muay Thai)!

FEATURES:

  • DEMOLISH mind-controlled cosplayers with your martial arts moves

  • EXPLORE the biggest convention center filled with shops, party zones, and suspicious VR booths

  • CUSTOMIZE Annie with different outfits - from knightly armor to boxing gear

  • RESCUE your friends who just want to have great time cosplaying, but keep getting in trouble

  • UNRAVEL the mystery behind Milon Huskey's evil plan before the main cosplay event takes place and there is no way back

Who knew making friends at a convention would involve so much punching? Probably everyone, honestly.

Note: No actual nerds were harmed in the making of this game. They were just temporarily inconvenienced.
